column5: I've been looking at buying a new ice suit for the coming season. I found sportsmansguide.ca through a google search. The prices seem right and gear seems good, but I was wondering if you guys knew of a Canadian company (as I'd rather support them). I checked out the other thread on Canadian manufacturers, but couldn't find what I was looking for.
Try Here ~  Frabill Ice Suit  Clam Corp Ice Armor

But Bass Pro Shops are a U.S.A. company.....  BTW you can save some money with Cabela's as that Clam suit is on sale with them right now.....  http://www.cabelas.com/product/Fishing/Ice-Fishing/Ice-Clothing-Footwear%7C/pc/104793480/c/104735880/sc/110969280/Clam-Outdoors-Ice-Armor8482-Suit/724290.uts?destination=%2Fcatalog%2Fbrowse%2Ffishing-ice-fishing-ice-clothing-footwear%2F_%2FN-1105958%2FNs-CATEGORY_SEQ_110969280%3FWTz_l%3DSBC%25253BMMcat104793480%253Bcat104735880&WTz_l=SBC%253BMMcat104793480%3Bcat104735880%3Bcat110969280
i believe salus is canadian http://www.salusmarine.com/
Yes, they are 100% Canadian unlike sportsmansguide.ca
